description.@en: With inward focus, you can attune yourself to the world as a combative technique. Taking in all the subtle noises, the rhythm of your opponent’s breathing and movement, you swiftly draw your sword – exhaling “kiai!” – to strike true.

effect.@en: Whenever you Take Aim for 2 AP with a melee weapon and successfully strike, roll two Fury Dice and select the better of the two to determine weapon Damage. In addition, you can Take Aim as a Reaction before Parrying attacks. You must attack with a Bladed type of weapon to utilize this Trait, and it must be sheathed before striking.
